name: St. Rose of Lima

locations.description: First saint of the Americas, lived in Lima, Peru

summary: Rose of Lima was a Peruvian lay Dominican who is the first person born in the Americas to be canonized as a saint. She lived a life of intense prayer, fasting, and penance in her parents' home in Lima. She was known for her care of the sick and poor, her mystical experiences, and her devotion to the Infant Jesus. She is the patron saint of Peru, the Americas, and the Philippines.
keyQuotes: Lord, increase my sufferings, and with them increase Your love in my heart.
